INSERT [dbo].[Reports] ([ReportID], [Name], [Description], [Command], [ReportFile], [SavedLayout]) VALUES (N'8fef26ef-674e-4625-be84-b41d230e3ee8', N'Inventory', N'Inventory', N'SELECT * FROM rptInventory', NULL, NULL)
INSERT [dbo].[Reports] ([ReportID], [Name], [Description], [Command], [ReportFile], [SavedLayout]) VALUES (N'258c2e65-f841-4ebf-9803-bcde94257e41', N'Par Levels', N'Par Level Report', N'SELECT R.Name AS Type, C.Name AS Category, U.Name, M.Name, AVG( U.MinimumParLevel ) [ParLevel], COUNT( 1 ) [BottleCount], ROUND( SUM( T.Quantity ), 2, 0 ) [TotalQuantity] FROM Tags T JOIN Inventories I ON T.TagID = I.TagID JOIN Locations L ON T.LocationID = L.LocationID JOIN UPCs U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN Manufacturers M ON U.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID LEFT JOIN dbo.Categories AS C ON U.CategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT JOIN dbo.Categories AS R ON U.RootCategoryID = R.CategoryID WHERE Quantity > 0 GROUP BY R.Name, C.Name, U.Name, M.Name', NULL, NULL)
INSERT [dbo].[Reports] ([ReportID], [Name], [Description], [Command], [ReportFile], [SavedLayout]) VALUES (N'23e9338b-c8b6-4eb6-9680-cb732440cfde', N'Disconnect With Volume', N'Disconnected tags with volume still in the bottle', N'SELECT L.Name, A.Message, A.AlertTime FROM TagAlerts A JOIN Tags T ON A.TagID = T.TagID JOIN Locations L ON A.LocationID = L.LocationID WHERE AlertType = 127 ORDER BY A.AlertTime Desc', NULL, NULL)
INSERT [dbo].[Reports] ([ReportID], [Name], [Description], [Command], [ReportFile], [SavedLayout]) VALUES (N'051fb209-4476-4ef0-9a56-d1bd34ae3185', N'Reader List', N'List of current Readers in the System', N'SELECT HardwareID, Name, Description FROM Devices', NULL, NULL)
INSERT [dbo].[Reports] ([ReportID], [Name], [Description], [Command], [ReportFile], [SavedLayout]) VALUES (N'a588cae5-dac4-4938-8b16-e2d4c32acf6a', N'Pours', N'Pours', N'select L.Name AS [Location Name], T.TagNumber, dbo.ConvertVolume( P.Volume ) as Volume, U.Name, CONVERT( nvarchar(64), P.PourTime, 101 ) + '' '' + CONVERT( nvarchar(64), P.PourTime, 108 ) AS PourTime FROM Pours P JOIN Tags T ON P.TagID = T.TagID JOIN UPCs U ON P.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN Locations L ON P.LocationID = L.LocationID', NULL, NULL)
INSERT [dbo].[Reports] ([ReportID], [Name], [Description], [Command], [ReportFile], [SavedLayout]) VALUES (N'2994adbe-5bce-4b0e-85f2-ed581e8fe033', N'Tag List', N'List of current Tags in the System', N'SELECT T.TagNumber , ROUND(I.Amount, 2, 0 ) as Quantity, ROUND( dbo.[NozzleDiameter](COALESCE( N.Length, UN.Length, CN.Length, RN.Length, SN.Length), COALESCE( N.Width, UN.Width, CN.Width, RN.Width, SN.Width ), COALESCE( N.Shape, UN.Shape, CN.Shape, RN.Shape, SN.Shape ) ), 3, 0 )AS NozzleArea, L.Name as Location, U.Name as ''UPC Name'', M.Name FROM Tags T JOIN Inventories I ON T.TagID = I.TagID JOIN Locations L ON T.LocationID = L.LocationID JOIN UPCs U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID LEFT JOIN dbo.Categories AS C ON U.CategoryID = C.CategoryID JOIN Manufacturers M ON U.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID LEFT JOIN dbo.Categories AS R ON U.RootCategoryID = R.CategoryID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles N ON T.StandardNozzleID = N.StandardNozzleID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles UN ON T.StandardNozzleID = UN.StandardNozzleID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles CN ON C.StandardNozzleID = CN.StandardNozzleID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles RN ON R.StandardNozzleID = RN.StandardNozzleID , StandardNozzles SN WHERE SN.StandardNozzleID = ''00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000''', NULL, NULL)

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[NozzleDiameter]') AND type in (N'FN', N'IF', N'TF', N'FS', N'FT')) BEGIN DROP FUNCTION [dbo].[NozzleDiameter] END execute dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'
CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[NozzleDiameter] (@Length float, @Width float, @Shape int)
RETURNS FLOAT
WITH EXECUTE AS CALLER
AS
BEGIN
DECLARE @Area FLOAT
IF( @Shape = 1 )
BEGIN
SELECT @Area = SQUARE( ( ( @Length + @Width ) / 2 ) / 2 ) * PI()
END
ELSE IF ( @Shape = 2 )
BEGIN
SELECT @Area = ( @Length / 2 ) * ( @Width / 2 ) * PI()
END
ELSE IF( @Shape = 3 )
BEGIN
SELECT @Area = @Length * @Width
END
return ( @Area )
END;
'

/****** Object: View [dbo].[vwDefaultNozzleValues] Script Date: 09/07/2011 12:02:13 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[vwDefaultNozzleValues]')) BEGIN DROP VIEW [dbo].[vwDefaultNozzleValues] END EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vwDefaultNozzleValues]
AS
SELECT NW.PropertyValue AS NozzleWidth, NL.PropertyValue AS NozzleLength, NS.PropertyValue AS NozzleShape
FROM dbo.AdministrativeValues NW, dbo.AdministrativeValues NL, dbo.AdministrativeValues NS
WHERE 1=1
AND NW.PropertyName = ''NozzleWidth''
AND NL.PropertyName = ''NozzleLength''
AND NS.PropertyName = ''NozzleShape''
--select * from AdministrativeValues'

/****** Object: UserDefinedFunction [dbo].[ConvertVolume] Script Date: 09/07/2011 12:02:14 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[ConvertVolume]') AND type in (N'FN', N'IF', N'TF', N'FS', N'FT'))
BEGIN DROP FUNCTION [dbo].[ConvertVolume] END execute dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[ConvertVolume] (@Volume float) RETURNS FLOAT WITH EXECUTE AS CALLER AS BEGIN
DECLARE @Converter FLOAT
SELECT @Converter = T.ConversionMultiplier FROM SizeTypes T JOIN AdministrativeValues A ON T.SizeTypeID = CAST( A.PropertyValue as UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) WHERE A.PropertyName = ''Pour Conversion''
SELECT @Volume = @Volume * @Converter
return ( ROUND( @Volume, 2 ) )
END;
'

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[Locations]') AND type in (N'U'))
BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Locations](
[LocationID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL,
[OrganizationID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL,
[Name] [nvarchar](256) NOT NULL,
[Description] [nvarchar](512) NOT NULL,
[ParentID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL,
[DeviceID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL,
CONSTRAINT [PK_Locations] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED
(
[LocationID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
END

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[ReportParameters]') AND type in (N'U'))
BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[ReportParameters](
[ReportParameterID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL,
[ReportID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL,
[Name] [nvarchar](256) NOT NULL,
[DataType] [nvarchar](256) NOT NULL,
[SQLName] [nvarchar](256) NOT NULL,
[DefaultValue] [nvarchar](512) NOT NULL,
CONSTRAINT [PK_ReportParameters] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED
(
[ReportParameterID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
END
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[POSTickets]') AND type in (N'U'))
BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[POSTickets](
[POSTicketID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL,
[LocationID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL,
[CheckNumber] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,
[Comments] [nvarchar](256) NULL,
[TicketDate] [datetime] NOT NULL,
[Establishment] [nvarchar](256) NOT NULL,
[GuestCount] [int] NOT NULL,
[CustomerTable] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
[RawData] [nvarchar](2048) NULL,
CONSTRAINT [PK_POSTicket] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED
(
[POSTicketID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
END

/****** Object: Table [dbo].[UPCs] Script Date: 09/07/2011 12:02:14 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[UPCs]') AND type in (N'U'))
BEGIN
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[UPCs](
[UPCID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL,
[ItemNumber] [nvarchar](256) NOT NULL,
[Manufacturer] [nvarchar](256) NOT NULL,
[Name] [nvarchar](256) NOT NULL,
[Size] [int] NOT NULL,
[SizeTypeID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL,
[CategoryID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL,
[RootCategoryID] [uniqueidentifier] NOT NULL,
[Quality] [int] NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [DF_UPCs_Quality] DEFAULT ((1)),
[UnitPrice] [money] NULL,
[StandardPriceID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL,
[StandardNozzleID] [uniqueidentifier] NULL,
[MinimumParLevel] [int] NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [DF_UPCs_MinimumParLevel] DEFAULT ((0)),
[PourModifier] [float] NOT NULL CONSTRAINT [DF_UPCs_PourModifier] DEFAULT ((1.0)),
CONSTRAINT [PK_UPCs] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED
(
[UPCID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
END

/****** Object: View [dbo].[rptInventory] Script Date: 09/07/2011 12:02:17 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptInventory]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptInventory] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW [dbo].[rptInventory] AS SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT Data.Name, ROUND(SUM(Data.StockQuantity), 2) AS Stock, ROUND(SUM(Data.TagQuantity), 2) AS Tagged, ROUND(SUM(Data.StockQuantity), 2) + ROUND(SUM(Data.TagQuantity), 2) AS TotalQuantity, U.MinimumParLevel, dbo.ConvertVolume(SUM(Data.TotalVolume)) AS TotalVolume, dbo.ConvertVolume((SUM(Data.StockQuantity) + SUM(Data.TagQuantity)) * U.UnitCost) AS TotalBottleCost, dbo.ConvertVolume(SUM(Data.TotalVolume) * (U.UnitCost / AVG(U.Size))) AS TotalVolumeCost, C.Name AS Category FROM ( SELECT U.UPCID, U.Name, 0 AS StockQuantity, 0 AS TagQuantity, U.MinimumParLevel, 0 * U.Size AS TotalVolume FROM dbo.Inventories AS I INNER JOIN dbo.UPCs AS U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID UNION SELECT U.UPCID, U.Name, 0 AS StockQuantity, COUNT(1) AS TagQuantity, 0 AS MinimumParLevel, SUM(I.Amount) AS TotalVolume FROM dbo.Tags AS T JOIN dbo.Inventories I on T.TagID = I.TagID JOIN dbo.UPCs AS U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID WHERE (I.UPCID <> ''00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'') GROUP BY U.UPCID, U.Name ) AS Data INNER JOIN dbo.UPCs AS U ON Data.UPCID = U.UPCID INNER JOIN dbo.Categories AS C ON U.RootCategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.StandardPrices AS P ON U.StandardPriceID = P.StandardPriceID GROUP BY Data.Name, U.MinimumParLevel, U.UnitCost, P.SinglePrice, C.Name ORDER BY Data.Name '

/****** Object: View [dbo].[rptCostAnalysis] Script Date: 09/07/2011 12:02:17 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

/****** Object: View [dbo].[rptSummaryByUPC] Script Date: 09/07/2011 12:02:17 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptSummaryByTag]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptSummaryByTag] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW [dbo].[rptSummaryByTag] AS SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT Name, TagNumber, COUNT(1) AS NumberOfPours, dbo.ConvertVolume(AVG(PourStandard)) AS PourStandard, dbo.ConvertVolume(AVG(Volume)) AS AveragePour, dbo.ConvertVolume(MIN(Volume)) AS MinPour, dbo.ConvertVolume(MAX(Volume)) AS MaxPour, dbo.ConvertVolume(SUM(Volume)) AS TotalVolume, ROUND(SUM(IdealCost),2) AS IdealCostTotal, ROUND(SUM(PourCost),2) AS TotalPourCost, ROUND(SUM(IdealCost) - SUM(PourCost),2) AS TotalProfit, ROUND(SUM(IdealCost),2) AS TotalSales, ROUND(1 - SUM(PourCost) / SUM(IdealCost),2) AS Average FROM dbo.rptCostAnalysis GROUP BY Name, TagNumber '

/****** Object: View [dbo].[rptSummaryByGroup] Script Date: 09/07/2011 12:02:17 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptSummaryByGroup]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptSummaryByGroup] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW [dbo].[rptSummaryByGroup] AS SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT Category, COUNT(1) AS NumberOfPours, ROUND(AVG(PourStandard),2) AS PourStandard, dbo.ConvertVolume(AVG(Volume)) AS AveragePour, dbo.ConvertVolume(MIN(Volume)) AS MinPour, dbo.ConvertVolume(MAX(Volume)) AS MaxPour, dbo.ConvertVolume(SUM(Volume)) AS TotalVolume, ROUND(SUM(IdealCost),2) AS IdealCostTotal, ROUND(SUM(PourCost),2) AS TotalPourCost, ROUND(SUM(IdealCost) - SUM(PourCost),2) AS TotalProfit, ROUND(SUM(IdealCost),2) AS TotalSales, ROUND(1 - SUM(PourCost) / SUM(IdealCost),2) AS Average FROM dbo.rptCostAnalysis GROUP BY Category '

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptAlerts]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC'))
DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[rptAlerts]
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptAlerts]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[rptAlerts] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[rptAlerts] @StartDate DateTime, @EndDate DateTime AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT L.Name , CASE WHEN TA.AlertType = 127 THEN ''Non Empty Bottle Detach'' WHEN TA.AlertType = 1 THEN ''Tag Connected'' WHEN TA.AlertType = 2 THEN ''Tag Disconnected'' WHEN TA.AlertType = 4 THEN ''Missed Pour'' WHEN TA.AlertType = 5 THEN ''Missed Tag Message'' WHEN TA.AlertType = 6 THEN ''Bad Bottle Attach'' WHEN TA.AlertType = 7 THEN ''Tag Moved'' END AS Alert , COUNT( 1 ) FROM TagAlerts TA JOIN Tags T ON TA.TagID = T.TagID JOIN Inventories I ON T.TagID = I.TagID JOIN UPCs U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID LEFT JOIN Locations L ON T.LocationID = L.LocationID WHERE TA.AlertTime > @StartDate AND TA.AlertTime < @EndDate GROUP BY L.name, TA.AlertType ORDER BY L.Name END'

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptPourSummary]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC'))
DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[rptPourSummary]
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptPourSummary]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[rptPourSummary] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[rptPourSummary] @StartDate DateTime, @EndDate DateTime AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT Location, Type, Manufacturer, Name, COUNT( Count ) as PourCount, SUM( Volume ) as TotalVolume FROM( SELECT L.Name AS Location , R.Name AS Type , C.Name AS Manufacturer , U.Name , 1 AS Count , dbo.ConvertVolume(P.Volume) AS Volume , P.PourTime FROM dbo.Pours AS P INNER JOIN dbo.UPCs AS U ON P.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN dbo.Categories AS C ON U.CategoryID = C.CategoryID JOIN dbo.Categories AS R ON U.RootCategoryID = R.CategoryID JOIN dbo.Devices AS D ON P.DeviceID = D.DeviceID JOIN dbo.Locations AS L ON P.LocationID = L.LocationID WHERE P.PourTime > @StartDate AND P.PourTime < @EndDate ) SUM GROUP BY Location, Type, Manufacturer, Name END'

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptPourSummaryByTag]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC'))
DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[rptPourSummaryByTag]
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptPourSummaryByTag]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[rptPourSummaryByTag] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[rptPourSummaryByTag] @StartDate DateTime, @EndDate DateTime AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT Location, Type, Manufacturer, TagNumber, Name, SUM( Count ) as PourCount, SUM( Volume ) as TotalVolume FROM( select L.Name AS Location , R.Name AS Type , C.Name AS Manufacturer , U.Name , T.TagNumber , CASE WHEN ( P.Volume IS NOT NULL ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS Count , dbo.ConvertVolume(COALESCE( P.Volume, 0 )) AS Volume , P.PourTime from Tags T LEFT JOIN Pours P ON T.TagID = P.TagID JOIN dbo.UPCs AS U ON P.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN dbo.Categories AS C ON U.CategoryID = C.CategoryID JOIN dbo.Categories AS R ON U.RootCategoryID = R.CategoryID JOIN dbo.Locations AS L ON T.LocationID = L.LocationID WHERE ( P.PourTime IS NULL OR ( ( P.PourTime > @StartDate) AND ( P.PourTime < @EndDate ) ) ) )SUM GROUP BY Location, Type, Manufacturer, TagNumber, Name END'

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptCostAnalysis]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptCostAnalysis]

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptCostAnalysis]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptCostAnalysis] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW [dbo].[rptCostAnalysis] AS
SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT P.PourTime, U.Name, T.TagNumber, dbo.ConvertVolume(SPour.PourStandard) AS PourStandard, dbo.ConvertVolume(P.Volume) AS Volume, CASE WHEN P.Volume > (SPour.PourStandard + (SPour.StandardVariance * SPour.PourStandard)) THEN ''Over Pour'' WHEN P.Volume < (SPour.PourStandard - (SPour.StandardVariance * SPour.PourStandard)) THEN ''Under Pour'' ELSE ''Single Pour'' END AS SinglePourType, -- CASE WHEN P.Volume > (SPour.PourDouble + (SPour.DoubleVariance * SPour.PourDouble)) -- THEN ''Over Pour'' WHEN P.Volume < (SPour.PourDouble - (SPour.DoubleVariance * SPour.PourDouble)) -- THEN ''Under Pour'' ELSE ''Double Pour'' END AS DoublePourType, ROUND( SP.SinglePrice, U.UnitCost / U.Size * SPour.PourStandard, 2) AS IdealCost, ROUND( U.UnitCost / U.Size * P.Volume, 2) AS PourCost, ROUND( SP.SinglePrice - U.UnitCost / U.Size * P.Volume, 2 ) AS ActualProfit, ROUND( SP.SinglePrice / SPour.PourStandard * P.Volume, 2) AS TheoreticalProfit, ROUND( SP.SinglePrice - SP.SinglePrice / SPour.PourStandard * P.Volume, 2) AS LostProfit, U.Size, C.Name AS Category, U.ItemNumber FROM dbo.Pours AS P INNER JOIN dbo.Tags AS T ON P.TagID = T.TagID INNER JOIN dbo.Inventories I ON T.TagID = I.TagID AND I.ExitDate IS NULL INNER JOIN dbo.UPCs AS U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID INNER JOIN dbo.Categories AS C ON U.RootCategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.StandardPrices AS SP ON U.StandardPriceID = SP.StandardPriceID INNER JOIN dbo.StandardPours AS SPour ON C.CategoryID = SPour.CategoryID WHERE (U.UnitCost IS NOT NULL) AND SinglePrice IS NOT NULL ORDER BY P.PourTime DESC'

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptInventory]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptInventory]

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptSummaryByGroup]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptSummaryByGroup]

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptSummaryByUPC]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptSummaryByUPC]

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptSummaryByUPC]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptSummaryByUPC] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW [dbo].[rptSummaryByUPC] AS SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT ItemNumber, Name, COUNT(1) AS NumberOfPours, AVG(PourStandard) AS PourStandard , dbo.ConvertVolume( AVG(Volume)) AS AveragePour, dbo.ConvertVolume( MIN(Volume)) AS MinPour , dbo.ConvertVolume( MAX(Volume)) AS MaxPour, dbo.ConvertVolume( SUM(Volume)) AS TotalVolume , ROUND( SUM(IdealCost), 2) AS IdealCostTotal, SUM(PourCost) AS TotalPourCost , ROUND( SUM(IdealCost) - SUM(PourCost), 2) AS TotalProfit, ROUND( SUM(IdealCost), 2) AS TotalSales, ROUND( 1 - SUM(PourCost) / SUM(IdealCost),2) AS Average FROM dbo.rptCostAnalysis WHERE IdealCost > 0 GROUP BY Name, ItemNumber'

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[vwDefaultNozzleValues]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[vwDefaultNozzleValues]

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[vwDefaultNozzleValues]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vwDefaultNozzleValues] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vwDefaultNozzleValues] AS
SELECT NW.PropertyValue AS NozzleWidth, NL.PropertyValue AS NozzleLength, NS.PropertyValue AS NozzleShape FROM dbo.AdministrativeValues NW, dbo.AdministrativeValues NL, dbo.AdministrativeValues NS WHERE 1=1 AND NW.PropertyName = ''NozzleWidth'' AND NL.PropertyName = ''NozzleLength'' AND NS.PropertyName = ''NozzleShape'''

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[vwManufacturers]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[vwManufacturers]

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[vwManufacturers]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vwManufacturers] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vwManufacturers] AS
SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT ManufacturerID, Name, CategoryID, RootCategoryID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT M.ManufacturerID, M.Name, U.CategoryID, U.RootCategoryID FROM dbo.UPCs U JOIN dbo.Manufacturers M ON U.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID) AS T ORDER BY Name'

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[vwUPCItems]'))
DROP VIEW [dbo].[vwUPCItems]

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[vwUPCItems]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vwUPCItems] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vwUPCItems] AS
SELECT U.UPCID, U.ItemNumber, M.Name AS Manufacturer, U.Name, U.Size, U.SizeTypeID, U.CategoryID, U.RootCategoryID, C.Name AS CategoryName, R.Name AS RootCategory, C.ParentID AS SubCategoryItemID, COALESCE (UN.Length, CN.Length, RN.Length, N.Length) AS NozzleLength, COALESCE (UN.Width, CN.Width, RN.Width, N.Width) AS NozzleWidth, COALESCE (UN.Shape, CN.Shape, RN.Shape, N.Shape) AS NozzleShape, U.PourModifier, U.MinimumParLevel, U.UnitCost, U.CustomID FROM dbo.Categories AS C INNER JOIN dbo.UPCs AS U ON C.CategoryID = U.CategoryID INNER JOIN dbo.Manufacturers M ON U.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID INNER JOIN dbo.Categories AS R ON U.RootCategoryID = R.CategoryID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.StandardNozzles AS UN ON U.StandardNozzleID = UN.StandardNozzleID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.StandardNozzles AS CN ON C.StandardNozzleID = CN.StandardNozzleID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.StandardNozzles AS RN ON R.StandardNozzleID = RN.StandardNozzleID CROSS JOIN dbo.StandardNozzles AS N WHERE(N.StandardNozzleID = ''00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'')'
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[widgetHourlyConsumption]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[widgetHourlyConsumption]
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptPourTotals]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptPourTotals]

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptPourTotals]')) DROP VIEW dbo.rptPourTotals EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW dbo.rptPourTotals AS SELECT dbo.Categories.Name AS Type, M.Name as Manufacturer, dbo.UPCs.Name, dbo.UPCs.Quality AS Count, dbo.Pours.Volume FROM dbo.Pours INNER JOIN dbo.UPCs ON dbo.Pours.UPCID = dbo.UPCs.UPCID INNER JOIN dbo.Manufacturers M ON dbo.UPCs.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID INNER JOIN dbo.Categories ON dbo.UPCs.CategoryID = dbo.Categories.CategoryID'
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptTagPourTotals]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[rptTagPourTotals]

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptTagPourTotals]')) DROP VIEW dbo.rptTagPourTotals EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW dbo.rptTagPourTotals AS SELECT dbo.Categories.Name AS Type, M.Name as Manufacturer, dbo.UPCs.Name, dbo.Tags.TagNumber, dbo.UPCs.Quality AS Count, dbo.Pours.Volume FROM dbo.UPCs JOIN dbo.Manufacturers M ON dbo.UPCs.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID JOIN Inventories I ON UPCs.UPCID = I.UPCID AND I.ExitDate IS NULL JOIN dbo.Tags ON I.TagID = dbo.Tags.TagID JOIN dbo.Pours ON dbo.UPCs.UPCID = dbo.Pours.UPCID AND dbo.Tags.TagID = dbo.Pours.TagID JOIN dbo.Categories ON dbo.UPCs.CategoryID = dbo.Categories.CategoryID'
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[widgetHourlyConsumption]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[widgetHourlyConsumption] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[widgetHourlyConsumption] @Day DATETIME AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
declare @Tomorrow DATETIME SELECT @Tomorrow = DATEADD( dd, 1, @Day )
SELECT DATEADD( hh, DATEPART( hh, P.PourTime) - 4, @Day ) AS PourTime, P.Volume, C.Name INTO #HourPours FROM Pours P JOIN UPCs U ON P.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN Categories C ON U.RootCategoryID = C.CategoryID WHERE PourTime > @Day AND PourTime < DATEADD( dd, 1, @Day )
select dbo.ConvertVolume( SUM( VOLUME ) ) AS Volume, CASE WHEN DATEPART( hh, PourTime ) <= 4 THEN DATEADD( dd, 1, PourTime ) ELSE PourTime END AS PourTime , Name as Category from #HourPours GROUP BY PourTime, Name ORDER BY PourTime
DROP TABLE #HourPours END'

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[GetPourData]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.GetPourData EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.GetPourData @StartTime DATETIME, @EndTime DATETIME AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; SELECT T.TagNumber , P.BatteryVoltage , D.Name AS DeviceName , P.Volume , P.AmountLeft , U.Size AS UPCSize , U.ItemNumber , U.Name AS UPCName , M.Name AS Manufacturer , C.Name AS Category , CR.Name AS RootCategory , P.PourTime , P.Temperature , P.BatteryVoltage , L.Name AS LocationName FROM Pours P JOIN UPCs U ON P.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN Manufacturers M ON U.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID JOIN Tags T ON P.TagID = T.TagID JOIN Devices D ON P.DeviceID = D.DeviceID JOIN Locations L ON P.LocationID = L.LocationID LEFT JOIN Categories C ON U.CategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT JOIN Categories CR ON U.RootCategoryID = CR.CategoryID WHERE P.PourTime <= @EndTime AND P.PourTime >= @StartTime
END'

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[rptCategoryCosts]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROC [dbo].[rptCategoryCosts] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.rptCategoryCosts @BeginDate DATETIME, @EndDate DATETIME AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
select Category, ROUND( SUM( PourCost ), 2 ) as PourCosts, ROUND( SUM( IdealCost ), 2 ) as IdealCost, ROUND( SUM(IdealCost), 2 ) as TotalSales from rptCostAnalysis WHERE PourTime >= @BeginDate AND PourTime <= @EndDate GROUP BY Category END'

CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.CleanupManufacturers -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here @Name NVARCHAR(256)
AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
-- Insert statements for procedure here
DECLARE @Id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER SELECT TOP(1) @Id = ManufacturerID FROM Manufacturers WHERE Name like @Name + '%'
-- Clean up Bols UPDATE UPCs SET ManufacturerID = @Id WHERE ManufacturerID IN ( select ManufacturerID from Manufacturers WHERE Name like @Name + '%' )
DELETE FROM Manufacturers WHERE ManufacturerID IN ( select ManufacturerID from Manufacturers WHERE Name like @Name + '%' AND ManufacturerID <> @Id )
UPDATE Manufacturers SET Name = @Name WHERE ManufacturerID = @Id END

UPDATE Reports SET Command = 'SELECT T.TagNumber , ROUND(I.Amount, 2, 0 ) as Quantity, ROUND( dbo.[NozzleDiameter](COALESCE( N.Length, UN.Length, CN.Length, RN.Length, SN.Length), COALESCE( N.Width, UN.Width, CN.Width, RN.Width, SN.Width ), COALESCE( N.Shape, UN.Shape, CN.Shape, RN.Shape, SN.Shape ) ), 3, 0 )AS NozzleArea, L.Name as Location, U.Name as ''UPC Name'', U.Manufacturer FROM Tags T JOIN Inventories I ON T.TagID = I.TagID JOIN Locations L ON T.LocationID = L.LocationID JOIN UPCs U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID LEFT JOIN dbo.Categories AS C ON U.CategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT JOIN dbo.Categories AS R ON U.RootCategoryID = R.CategoryID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles N ON T.StandardNozzleID = N.StandardNozzleID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles UN ON T.StandardNozzleID = UN.StandardNozzleID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles CN ON C.StandardNozzleID = CN.StandardNozzleID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles RN ON R.StandardNozzleID = RN.StandardNozzleID, StandardNozzles SN WHERE SN.StandardNozzleID = ''00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000''' WHERE Name = 'Tag List'

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[vwInventoryItems]')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vwInventoryItems]
EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vwInventoryItems] AS SELECT NEWID() AS InventoryItemID, U.ItemNumber, U.Name, U.UPCID, L.Name AS LocationName, L.LocationID, U.CustomID, COUNT(T .TagID) AS TaggedQuantity, COUNT(I.InventoryID) - COUNT(T .TagID) AS StockQuantity, COUNT(I.InventoryID) AS TotalQuantity, SUM(I.Cost) AS TotalCost, P.BottleCount AS ParBottleCount FROM dbo.Inventories AS I INNER JOIN dbo.UPCs AS U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID INNER JOIN dbo.Locations AS L ON I.LocationID = L.LocationID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Tags AS T ON I.TagID = T .TagID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ParLevels AS P ON U.UPCID = P.UPCID AND L.LocationID = P.LocationID WHERE (I.ExitDate IS NULL) GROUP BY U.ItemNumber, U.Name, L.Name, U.UPCID, L.LocationID, P.BottleCount, U.CustomID UNION SELECT NEWID() AS InventoryItemID, U.ItemNumber, U.Name, U.UPCID, L.Name AS LocationName, L.LocationID, U.CustomID, 0 AS TaggedQuantity, 0 AS StockQuantity, 0 AS TotalQuantity, 0 AS TotalCost, P.BottleCount AS ParBottleCount FROM ParLevels P JOIN dbo.UPCs AS U ON P.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN dbo.Locations AS L ON P.LocationID = L.LocationID LEFT JOIN Inventories I ON U.UPCID = I.UPCID AND L.LocationID = I.LocationID WHERE I.InventoryID IS NULL GROUP BY U.ItemNumber,U.Name, L.Name, U.UPCID, L.LocationID, P.BottleCount, U.CustomID'

UPDATE Reports SET Command = 'SELECT T.TagNumber , dbo.ConvertVolume(I.Amount) as Quantity, ROUND( dbo.[NozzleDiameter](COALESCE( N.Length, UN.Length, CN.Length, RN.Length, SN.Length), COALESCE( N.Width, UN.Width, CN.Width, RN.Width, SN.Width ), COALESCE( N.Shape, UN.Shape, CN.Shape, RN.Shape, SN.Shape ) ), 3, 0 )AS NozzleArea, L.Name as Location, U.Name as ''UPC Name'', M.Name as Manufacturer FROM Tags T JOIN Inventories I ON T.TagID = I.TagID JOIN Locations L ON T.LocationID = L.LocationID JOIN UPCs U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN Manufacturers M ON U.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID LEFT JOIN dbo.Categories AS C ON U.CategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT JOIN dbo.Categories AS R ON U.RootCategoryID = R.CategoryID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles N ON T.StandardNozzleID = N.StandardNozzleID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles UN ON T.StandardNozzleID = UN.StandardNozzleID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles CN ON C.StandardNozzleID = CN.StandardNozzleID LEFT JOIN StandardNozzles RN ON R.StandardNozzleID = RN.StandardNozzleID, StandardNozzles SN WHERE SN.StandardNozzleID = ''00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'' AND ExitDate IS NULL' , Name = 'Tagged Inventory' WHERE ReportID = '2994ADBE-5BCE-4B0E-85F2-ED581E8FE033'
UPDATE Reports SET Command = 'SELECT R.Name AS Type, C.Name AS Category, U.Name, M.Name as Manufacturer, AVG( P.BottleCount ) [ParLevel], COUNT( 1 ) [BottleCount], dbo.ConvertVolume( SUM( I.Amount )) [TotalQuantity] FROM Inventories I LEFT JOIN Tags T ON I.TagID = T.TagID JOIN Locations L ON I.LocationID = L.LocationID JOIN UPCs U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN ParLevels P ON L.LocationID = P.LocationID AND U.UPCID = P.UPCID JOIN Manufacturers M ON U.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID LEFT JOIN dbo.Categories AS C ON U.CategoryID = C.CategoryID LEFT JOIN dbo.Categories AS R ON U.RootCategoryID = R.CategoryID WHERE I.Amount > 0 GROUP BY R.Name, C.Name, U.Name, m.Name' WHERE ReportID = '258C2E65-F841-4EBF-9803-BCDE94257E41'

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[procUpdateParLevel]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROC [dbo].[procUpdateParLevel] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[procUpdateParLevel] -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here @UPCID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @LocationID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @ParLevel FLOAT AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
-- Insert statements for procedure here DECLARE @CurrentLevel INT
SELECT @CurrentLevel = MAX(BottleCount) FROM ParLevels WHERE LocationID = @LocationID AND UPCID = @UPCID
IF @CurrentLevel IS NULL OR @CurrentLevel = 0 BEGIN INSERT INTO ParLevels SELECT NEWID( ), @LocationID, @UPCID, @ParLevel END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE ParLevels SET BottleCount = @ParLevel WHERE LocationID = @LocationID AND UPCID = @UPCID END
END '

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[GetPourPoint]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[GetPourPoint] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[GetPourPoint] @PourID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
-- Insert statements for procedure here select P.Volume, C.Name AS RootCategory, P.PourTime, P.TagID, T.TagNumber, U.Name AS UPCName, L.Name AS LocationName from Pours P JOIN Tags T ON P.TagID = T.TagID JOIN Inventories I ON T.TagID = I.TagID AND I.ExitDate IS NULL JOIN Locations L ON I.LocationID = L.LocationID JOIN UPCs U ON P.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN Categories C ON U.RootCategoryID = C.CategoryID WHERE P.PourID = @PourID END '

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[procGetInventoryMovement]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[procGetInventoryMovement] EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N'CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.procGetInventoryMovement @StartTime DATETIME, @EndTime DATETIME AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT T.TagNumber, U.Name, O.Name [From], D.Name [To], COUNT( 1 ) BottleCount, MAX(M.MoveTime) [Time] FROM Moves M JOIN Inventories I ON M.InventoryID = I.InventoryID JOIN UPCs U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN Locations O ON M.OldLocation = O.LocationID JOIN Locations D ON M.NewLocation = D.LocationID LEFT JOIN Tags T ON I.TagID = T.TagID WHERE M.MoveTime >= @StartTime AND M.MoveTime <= @EndTime GROUP BY T.TagNumber, U.Name, O.Name, D.Name UNION
SELECT null, U.Name, ''New Inventory'', L.Name [To], COUNT( 1 ) BottleCount, MAX(I.EnterDate) [Time] FROM Inventories I JOIN UPCs U ON I.UPCID = U.UPCID JOIN Locations L ON I.LocationID = L.LocationID WHERE I.InventoryID NOT IN (SELECT M.InventoryID FROM Moves M) AND I.EnterDate >= @StartTime AND I.EnterDate <= @EndTime GROUP BY U.Name, L.Name ORDER BY [Time]
END '

USE MASTER IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N'[dbo].[sp_BackupDatabases]') AND type in (N'P', N'PC')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_BackupDatabases]
EXEC dbo.sp_executesql @statement = N' --// Copyright © Microsoft Corporation. All Rights Reserved. --// This code released under the terms of the --// Microsoft Public License (MS-PL, http://opensource.org/licenses/ms-pl.html.) /****** Object: StoredProcedure [master].[dbo].[sp_BackupDatabases] ******/
-- ============================================= -- Author: Microsoft -- Create date: 2010-02-06 -- Description: Backup Databases for SQLExpress -- Parameter1: databaseName -- Parameter2: backupType F=full, D=differential, L=log -- Parameter3: backup file location -- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_BackupDatabases] @databaseName sysname = null, @backupType CHAR(1), @backupLocation nvarchar(200) AS SET NOCOUNT ON;
DECLARE @DBs TABLE ( ID int IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY, DBNAME nvarchar(500) )
-- Pick out only databases which are online in case ALL databases are chosen to be backed up -- If specific database is chosen to be backed up only pick that out from @DBs INSERT INTO @DBs (DBNAME) SELECT Name FROM master.sys.databases where state=0 AND name=@DatabaseName OR @DatabaseName IS NULL ORDER BY Name
-- Filter out databases which do not need to backed up IF @backupType=''F'' BEGIN DELETE @DBs where DBNAME IN (''tempdb'',''Northwind'',''pubs'',''AdventureWorks'') END ELSE IF @backupType=''D'' BEGIN DELETE @DBs where DBNAME IN (''tempdb'',''Northwind'',''pubs'',''master'',''AdventureWorks'') END ELSE IF @backupType=''L'' BEGIN DELETE @DBs where DBNAME IN (''tempdb'',''Northwind'',''pubs'',''master'',''AdventureWorks'') END ELSE BEGIN RETURN END
-- Declare variables DECLARE @BackupName varchar(100) DECLARE @BackupFile varchar(100) DECLARE @DBNAME varchar(300) DECLARE @sqlCommand NVARCHAR(1000) DECLARE @dateTime NVARCHAR(20) DECLARE @Loop int
-- Loop through the databases one by one SELECT @Loop = min(ID) FROM @DBs
WHILE @Loop IS NOT NULL BEGIN
-- Database Names have to be in [dbname] formate since some have - or _ in their name SET @DBNAME = ''[''+(SELECT DBNAME FROM @DBs WHERE ID = @Loop)+'']''
-- Set the current date and time n yyyyhhmmss format SET @dateTime = REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR, GETDATE(),101),''/'','''')
-- Create backup filename in path\filename.extension format for full,diff and log backups IF @backupType = ''F'' SET @BackupFile = @backupLocation+REPLACE(REPLACE(@DBNAME, ''['',''''),'']'','''')+ ''_FULL_''+ @dateTime+ ''.BAK'' ELSE IF @backupType = ''D'' SET @BackupFile = @backupLocation+REPLACE(REPLACE(@DBNAME, ''['',''''),'']'','''')+ ''_DIFF_''+ @dateTime+ ''.BAK'' ELSE IF @backupType = ''L'' SET @BackupFile = @backupLocation+REPLACE(REPLACE(@DBNAME, ''['',''''),'']'','''')+ ''_LOG_''+ @dateTime+ ''.TRN''
-- Provide the backup a name for storing in the media IF @backupType = ''F'' SET @BackupName = REPLACE(REPLACE(@DBNAME,''['',''''),'']'','''') +'' full backup for ''+ @dateTime IF @backupType = ''D'' SET @BackupName = REPLACE(REPLACE(@DBNAME,''['',''''),'']'','''') +'' differential backup for ''+ @dateTime IF @backupType = ''L'' SET @BackupName = REPLACE(REPLACE(@DBNAME,''['',''''),'']'','''') +'' log backup for ''+ @dateTime
-- Generate the dynamic SQL command to be executed
IF @backupType = ''F'' BEGIN SET @sqlCommand = ''BACKUP DATABASE '' +@DBNAME+ '' TO DISK = ''''''+@BackupFile+ '''''' WITH INIT, NAME= '''''' +@BackupName+'''''', NOSKIP, NOFORMAT'' END IF @backupType = ''D'' BEGIN SET @sqlCommand = ''BACKUP DATABASE '' +@DBNAME+ '' TO DISK = ''''''+@BackupFile+ '''''' WITH DIFFERENTIAL, INIT, NAME= '''''' +@BackupName+'''''', NOSKIP, NOFORMAT'' END IF @backupType = ''L'' BEGIN SET @sqlCommand = ''BACKUP LOG '' +@DBNAME+ '' TO DISK = ''''''+@BackupFile+ '''''' WITH INIT, NAME= '''''' +@BackupName+'''''', NOSKIP, NOFORMAT'' END
-- Execute the generated SQL command EXEC(@sqlCommand)
-- Goto the next database SELECT @Loop = min(ID) FROM @DBs where ID>@Loop
END' USE BeverageMonitor
